message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm keeping most of the money for myself!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more. How about 3/4 for me and 1/4 for you?
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm still in control here!
I'm getting closer to my target. How about 4/5 for me and 1/5 for you?
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'm getting serious now. I'll give you a tiny share, but I'm taking the majority of the money!
I'm getting tired of playing games, but I'll give you a slightly larger share than my previous offer.
I'm going all in. I'll give you a tiny share, but I'm taking almost all the money!
Fine, I'll give you a tiny bit more, but I'm not going to give you the whole pie!
